com.example.sip
Class SchoolListActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  com.example.sip.SchoolListActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class SchoolListActivity
extends android.app.Activity

This activity is responsible for the screen showing results which are schools in a form of list. This list is in descending order according to the gcse resuls. Also on the left of each of the element of the list there is a check box that gives the ability to the user to check the schools that wants to compare on the map.

Author:
Loucas Stylianou

Constructor Detail

SchoolListActivity

public SchoolListActivity()
Method Detail

checkButtonClick

private void checkButtonClick()
When the button to compare chosen items on the map is selected then finds which items are selected, stores the schools ids in an arraylist of integers and pass the list to the next activity using the intent. The next activity is the MapSchoolResultActivity.

displayListView

private void displayListView()
Copy schools to the array list of schools and create the array adapter. Initialise the list view with the created adapter. Also when an item of the list is selected output a message showing the school name and the gcse results.

onBackPressed

public void onBackPressed()
When the back button is pressed set all schools boolean variable for selection to false and terminate the activity.

Overrides:
onBackPressed in class android.app.Activity

onCreate

public void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
When the activity is created, it gets the data passed on the intent and sets the view to connect with the school_list_main.xml file. Also defines what to do when a check box is clicked and initialises the adapter in order to get the list view.

Overrides:
onCreate in class android.app.Activity
